name: Modular (Spidermanfan244)
description:
Tired of playing games where you have to actively move? Interested in playing a game that changes how you move completely? Then take a look at Modular. Shoot, slide and grapple your way through the levels to hit the switch at the end, and complete the level.

This game is a work on a concept I've had for a while. Any feedback or suggestions would be greatly appreciated.
